meta.title: B&B Vita Nova - Rooms
meta.description: Aboard of B&B Vita Nova in Amersfoort you can spend the night in one of the five ship's cabins, the sailor's cabin or the skipper's house. A unique experience!

shipsCabin.title: Ship's cabin
shipsCabin.description: The ship’s cabins are cozy and fully equipped. The modern furnished rooms have a double bed with an en suite bathroom. There is a skylight in the room that is electrically operated. The wifi is complementary. Additionally, you can make use of the common area to relax and socialize.

sailorsCabin.title: Sailor's cabin
sailorsCabin.description: Looking for a special experience? Book to stay in our original sailor’s cabin. The sailor’s cabin is equipped with an en suite bathroom and its own entry from the deck. There are two separate single beds and one of them has a trundle bed underneath. The sailor’s cabin is best suited for 2 or 3 adults or a family with two little children.
sailorsCabin.extraInfo: Please keep in mind you’re on a boat. The sailor’s cabin has a lowered ceiling and steep stairs. There are no windows to the side, so it is not suitable for those with claustrophobia. Especially with three adults, the space can be experienced as small. If you are looking for accommodation for a longer period of time, we advise you to book a ship's cabin.
